data.name: pegasus_core|Button_Name_Trample_Button
data.tooltip:
Goes into rampage, pushing, stunning and dealing <d ref="duckiesHostileMagmadonTrample_DamageRadius.amount  / duckiesHostileMagmadonTrample_CasterBuff.periodic_duration" style="Red"/> <Red>(+</><d ref="duckiesHostileMagmadonTrample_TagBonusLight.bonus / duckiesHostileMagmadonTrample_CasterBuff.periodic_duration" style="Red"/> <Red>vs Light)</> damage per second to nearby enemy ground enemies.

Lasts for <d ref="duckiesHostileMagmadonTrample_CasterBuff.duration"/> seconds.
